mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rochemont, Quinette de
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends Jefferson 3 pamphlets not brought to his attention earlier; the naivetï¿½ of the author of the first is a guarantee of the exactitude of the facts related; the second shows the state of political parties in France; the third proves that France still has enlightened defenders of the right of man; the law on elections which he and Jefferson had spoken on will strengthen national representation and give life to the constitutional charter.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1817 August 6, New York, [New York] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
